about_the_game:
▊INTRODUCTION


Mons is quite a talented hacker.
His parents died from an accident 17 years ago, which made him so introverted that he was reluctant to go out.
He got a hoop that can summon high level creatures, accidentally, but in the mean time it was somehow bound to be happened. However, the hoop made him fall into a huge and complicated crisis. And he should find the way to rescue himself from the people who were approved by the hoop.
The story happens in the near future, including the factor of religion, antisocial and gay love. Each time you start the game, you will get the different and various experience.

▊PLAY


BlackhoopS is a unique kind of visual novel.
You will play Mons Douglas, and have a very immersive experience in interlocking storylines and among beautiful pictures.
Every choice you make will affect the others' fate and the direction of this story.
This unique game system will change your perception of word games.

▊Initiation


New version is update!
In this remake version, in order to make the subsequent development more smoother, we redesigned the game process and abandoned the lengthy content.
We have remade many parts. In order to enhance the story experience, we use the camera animation in the new engine, and have adjusted the art resources.

Start to play the new version：


We will continue to optimize it until it can be officially released！

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains elements of homosexual, naked and violence, which is not suitable to play in public places.
